title: Next Championship Skin! Place your bets :)
body: So, we had Championship Riven {{champion:92}}  in Season 2, Championship Thresh {{champion:412}}  Season 3 and Shyvana {{champion:102}}  Season 4 and we already have a Kalista one on the PBE for Season 5 {{champion:429}} .  So that means there has already been a Top lane, a Support, an ADC and a Jungler, That just leaves an Assassin/Mage for 2016 :3. My bet's on Syndra {{champion:134}}  being the next championship skin, any thoughts?

replies.body: Maybe Azir. I'm surprised they didn't give it to him this year! =_= In my opinion he has had a huge time in the limelight this season.
I think it should be Leb, diana ,or kata.

> [{quoted}](name=ExiledBlade,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=f39KEby3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-16T00:46:01.694+0000)
>
> I think it should be Leb, diana ,or kata.

Even though I used to be a kat main (I own all her skins to because I was so obsessed) she has enough XD I was surprised when they bought out Warring Kingdoms Kat, that's her eighth skin now.

It depends.

Championship skins are chosen based on how much a champion has impacted that season.
